data.title: US Stocks Likely To Open Lower Following Alphabet, AMD Earnings: Walt Disney, Uber, Ford, Qualcomm In Focus
data.description: U.S. stock futures declined on Wednesday after Tuesday's advances amid trade war concerns and major earnings reports.

data.title: Google-Parent Alphabet Plunges 7% In Wednesday Pre-Market: What's Going On?
data.description: The shares of Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ: GOOG) took a 6.9% hit in pre-market hours trading following the company's Q4 2024 earnings announcement on Feb. 5. Despite reporting revenue growth, Alphabet's cloud revenue fell short of market expectations, while AI spending saw a significant increase.

data.title: Vestas Wind Systems Earnings Report: Q4 Overview
Toyota Stock Rises 3% Pre-Market After It Upgrades Full Year Forecast Despite Drop In Q3 Earnings
data.description: Toyota hiked its full-year operating income outlook by 400 billion yen ($2.62 billion) to 4,700 billion yen for the financial year ending March 2025.

data.title: Snacks Giant Mondelez Q4 Earnings: Sales Miss, EPS Falls Short, Cocoa Inflation Threatens 2025 & More
data.description: Mondelez International reported Q4 revenue of $9.60 billion, falling below estimates. While gross profit rose 6.9%, cocoa cost inflation pressures the company's outlook for FY25.
